title:
What information can you give about the moth balling of the Liberty Ships after WWII?  As a child living in Sunset Park I remember looking across the Cape Fear River and being able to see the ships in the distance. There were lined up along the Brunswick River I was told.

When was the last ship scraped? 



They were still there when I moved from Wilmington in 1967.
